import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return ( <>

배송지

주소 : {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

결제 방법

지불 선택 : {cart.paymentMethod}

주문 상품

{cart.cartItems.length <= 0 ? 카트가 비었습니다 : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X {item.price}원 = {item.qty * item.price}원 ))} )} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
